website_summaries.verdict: Very popular model with a sleek, durable, and efficient wallet design for iPhones of all sizes.
pros: Wallet case is detachable to function as a two-way stand
Can work with magnetic car mounts
cons: Not the best case for glass screen protection
A few complaints of low-quality stitching

customer_reviews.title: Great if you were a teenager with no credit cards or multiple IDs
customer_reviews.text: If you’re like me and you have more than two credit cards or cards of any kind that this case will be nearly useless. The problem is quite simple you can only put a bare minimum of cards or ideas in this thing otherwise it will not close. This is not a replacement for a full-size wallet or purse it is likely meant to just carry basics but in all honesty I don’t get it. Why would you buy this put a few things in it and then carry a wallet or purse in addition because this thing simply can’t carry enough
customer_reviews.author: Clifford Jurkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Synthetic leather is synthetic, otherwise great case!
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I can find is that this is “vegan leather” which is just a spin/buzz/marketing word for synthetic leather. So rather than looking good after a year, I can be fairly sure it’s going to fall apart before then. Can’t stain it a darker color as I had planned for the same reason. Though I must admit, about the time this case falls apart, i’ll Likely be getting a new phone so can’t complain too much there. Lastly there’s about a quarter of an inch space between the front folio and the iPhone screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: The case stretches just enuff with use to easily store the multiple cards (credit
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one I've had from them. There was an issue with the stitching coming undone for the magnetic clasp on my first one, so they sent the whole outer section as a replacement. And did it quickly. As mentioned in other reviews, the magnets seem stronger and close easier, quicker, and more securely now. The case stretches just enuff with use to easily store the multiple cards (credit, business, id, license, etc) that I keep, plus a couple of bills ($$).Each new one is for a new phone and will keep using them!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Parker

customer_reviews.title: The Previous Reviewers Were Right!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't help but notice all the amazingly pleased Reviews on this product! So decided on this case for my iPhone...And of course they were right! So easy to use and adapt to many different needs while using your iPhone! Love the magnet that keeps iPhone in place, just pops in and out with no trouble at all! I now have an easy way to go shopping without lugging around a big purse all day!! PERFECT!! Thanks Dreem Team!!
customer_reviews.author: amazon midwest fan

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want!
customer_reviews.text: First the leather is very nice and it has room for your cards as well as enough room to put a few bills in the open slot for money. The magnet closure works perfectly. It does not fast charge in case for me (but didn’t see it stated in advertisement). Second, I have had about 10 email conversations with customer service due to an Amazon screw up on shipping notification. Their customer service is attentive, understanding, and I’d be glad to buy from them again
customer_reviews.author: C&SMcD

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting to not like this, but wanted a walled case
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was expecting to not like this, but wanted a walled case, sometimes... went for this and well, I love this! Had for about 2 months, still getting over no wallet in pocket, but this is working nice. If you use cash it is a learning curve as the case slot is not great (I use a money clip now). Leather is nice, and seems as if it will hold up well. If not, I'll update.
customer_reviews.author: Mongo

customer_reviews.title: This is fantastic! Made my life easier
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! Made my life easier! The magnet is strong enough to hold onto my car-mount magnet even through the outer case. So you have the option of leaving the outer case on or just popping it off. So easy. Before, I would have to take my phone out of my case entirely to get it to stick in the car. This is so much better! Everyone compliments me on the case and the quality and look are excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Mom2dna

customer_reviews.title: IPhone X- Does not support Wireless Charging - Bait and Switch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I was told that a wireless case was in the works and once it becomes available they would replace my case for free. Guess what? that never happened. now i am being told that they will not support wireless charging any longer. Good case, but stay away if you need wireless charging for Iphone X
customer_reviews.author: Renis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Not accostumed to giving out highest ratings but not much to complain about with this case. Been a couple months and no visible wear on material, including corners. I usually keep it in back pocket except when on the road. Spilled some wine on it and expected discolorization but after wiping it down and air drying there is zero effect from the spill. Magnets are plenty strong and am getting complements on its looks
customer_reviews.author: john Miller

customer_reviews.title: Simplify your life
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. I no longer have to carry both a wallet and a phone. Plenty of room for credit cards, cash, receipts, etc. Plus it is really two cases in one. With the thin case around the phone magentically attaching to the fold around wallet portion. When I am out and dont need a wallet like in a hotel I just take the phone. Or when taking pictures I can detach. Totally simplified my life.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Kravz

customer_reviews.title: Quality material and Excellent Design for my iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. Very nice leather and the fit is perfect. I like how the phone comes out of the wallet and is already has a metal plate to fit my magnetic phone holder in my car. The phone stays secure in the wallet with the magnet. The wallet is nice for cards and protects the phone when it goes in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sewerman

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Had a similar one for my iphone ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Had a similar one for my iphone 6. This is slimmer though. Only gotcha is that there isn't a clear sleeve that I can have my drivers license in so I can flash it to the sales assistants. I have to pull out my driving license everytime. Small gotcha though because I really do love this wallet. Looks classy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not only do I love this case
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I love this case, but I love this company. The case easily first 6 credit cards and still closes nicely. It also has an inside side pocket to slip cash into. Works great with magnet car holders! I also have an iPhone 6+ case and the corner of the removable holder broke off and they replaced with no problem at all! I can't say enough about this case or this company!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy V Davies

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn’t sure if I would like the case. It makes the phone a little bigger. But after using it a few days—I love it. There is plenty of room for 3 cards and cash. The magnet to hold the phone in place is strong. I would definitely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, check out the Dreem iPhone Wallet Case
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the Dreem iPhone Wallet Case because it has a detaachable case, which I find it very convenient when in the gym. The clip-on/off case is sturdy and the magnetized back sits securly when in the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Sophy

customer_reviews.title: Not as happy with new one as my previous one but still keeping it.
customer_reviews.text: I loved my old Dreem case but I bought a new phone and so had to buy a new case. They began leather isn’t as soft and flexible on my new case and it seems a slightly tighter fit as I can’t get as many cards etc. to fit in it. Maybe it will stretch a little and work better.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. Parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Good design, function
customer_reviews.text: Great products, design function. Especailly, in my car, magnetic works really well. Good size and rich taste. It is not a cheap cover. It protects my phone well too. I had issue with magnetics but their support team was wonderful, Dreem did really great job for customer. I will buy it again,.
customer_reviews.author: SO

customer_reviews.title: Be careful,if looking for wireless charging compatible.  Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Misleadingly shows up when you search iPhone X wallet case wireless charging compatible (sponsored ad). In text of ad it does state that it is only wireless charging compatible if you remove detachable case. Right out of the box magnetic clasps didn’t work
customer_reviews.author: TeBu58

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Not sure how much it would protect phone if dropped?
customer_reviews.text: This case/wallet looks great! Love how the phone magnetically attaches to wallet. I just don’t feel like the phone case alone will protect my phone if it’s dropped. Also seems when phone is in wallet my credit cards rub on screen protector causing scuffs and scratches. Not a fan of that.
customer_reviews.author: CindiKRyan

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Magnetic system holds phone securely in position within the leather case...AND allows me to simply lift the phone out of the case for tripod photos/video usage. The cover allows me to talk on phone with the cover closed. Well built, I'm VERY happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Laugh Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I had been on the search for similar products for a while, but this case convinced me from the start. The case is not too thick but still offers many options for credit cards, driver license, etc. I like the option of removing the iPhone easily, and the magnets are reliably strong.
customer_reviews.author: Copperhill Technologies Corporation

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous customer service. Oh yeah the case is awesome too!
customer_reviews.text: The item came on time and was exactly as described. I only caution that the folio part is a bit bigger than i anticipated, but the inner case is so beautiful that I ended up keeping both sections anyways. Also I need to add, customer support was absolutely tremendous. I had an issue with the product (nothing to do with quality or anything) and sent an email to see if I could resolve the matter. I received an email promptly that informed me that they would go above and beyond to solve my issue. This seller is top-notch and I would suggest them to absolutely anyone who wants to buy a case for their phone.
customer_reviews.author: Shashank K.

customer_reviews.title: Great case, love the magnetic nature of the case
customer_reviews.text: I love these cases. They stretch out over time if you put cards in the pockets, so on this one I’m not leaving cards in there. It holds up well otherwise and due to the magnetic case, it easily mounts to magnetic vent holders without anything extra.
customer_reviews.author: JinLee

customer_reviews.title: it is very handy to carry!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few case for all different iPhone and different company, until now I bought it from you honestly I am so happy to had it and use it and I will keep you in mind all the time, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Alen Truong

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, Luxurious and Understated Elegance
customer_reviews.text: sleek, luxurious and understated elegance - just perfect for my new iphone X. Nicely stitched. Wanted a non-leather folio, but didn't like the look of the cheaper non-leather options. (Bought one of the cheaper ones and returned it in a hurry) Tried this vegan leather, and just love it.
customer_reviews.author: n23

customer_reviews.title: Good design Bad Product! Not practical unless you baby sit your phone !
customer_reviews.text: Product has a good look and feel but poor quality specially of the edges of the case (black colored). The case breaks very easily from 2-4ft height. It’s overpriced and wouldn’t recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Arjun27

customer_reviews.title: Nice but slightly bigger than iPhoneX. See pics.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Nice material. The brown is exactly what I wanted, slightly lighter than the color on my screen. My only issue is this is a little bigger than my phone and there is a gap when I close my case. It’s not a huge deal but I noticed it. See pics.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole T.

customer_reviews.title: Great case, bad service
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality, honestly one of the best cases I’ve ever owned. However communication with this company is impossible. I’ve tried for 2 months to get a case replacement and no reply. Edit: I got my reply and new case. Hopefully this new customer service is here to stay.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: My wife likes this the best..
customer_reviews.text: It is the only type my wife will have... Doesn't like any other cases I've gotten.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Stoneburner

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never written a review before, but I feel obligated to share my opinion. This product is very well designed, and although I’ve only used for 60 days, I have so far found this to be very durable. I really enjoy how effective the magnets are. I’ve also enjoyed a side benefit of not checking my phone as often. Usually if I glance over and see a new notification or email, I somewhat obsessively take a look. Now with my phone covered I find that temptation has been removed.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond J Upp

customer_reviews.title: not durable
customer_reviews.text: After less than 3 months of usage, I somehow managed to break the interior shell as I put the phone inside my jeans one day, one of the corner just split into 2, I guess it got caught on my jeans, but well, this means my pair of levis are more durable than this, maybe rightly so since it's more expensive. Also the leather case stitching around the tabs are just coming loose I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this case and the face that you can take ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this case and the face that you can take the phone out of the wallet portion of it. The only downside is that you can only put so many bills in the slot behind the cards. Otherwise it doesn't close very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Karli Flores

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is in love with this phone case/wallet. He's never used the same case for more than a month (he's had this case on for 6+ months now).
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Wallet & Phone Case in One!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to combine my wallet and phone! I have an iphoneX and it fits perfectly. I love the magnetic case that holds my phone. It provides great protection and the phone controls are not covered up by the case, which makes them much more user friendly. A strong magnet holds the phone securely in the case, plus it works great with my phone bracket in the car! Excellent Quality!!! A great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Trask

customer_reviews.title: Great case! The magnets hold tight and the fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case! The magnets hold tight and the fit and finish is great. I wish that I didn't have to take the phone out of the case to make wireless charging work, but that was made quite clear in the product description and honestly is not a huge deal considering the quality of the case.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic case, it works really well
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic case, it works really well. I specifically wanted space for 3cards, I’m handicapped and I carry my debit, credit and I’d cards...perfectly. I took off a star because I wanted a darker brown so I emailed them directly about a replacement but I did not hear back, not that big a deal but a reply would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Best IPhone Cover
customer_reviews.text: One of the best phone covers I purchased!! Just have to be careful not demagnetized your credit cards. Very strong magnet!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Casing broke so no longer useful.
customer_reviews.text: Have not even had this product a year and the plastic casing which holds the inner part of the phone has chipped and broken away. The inside removable case no longer holds the phone in place making the whole thing useless. Very unfortunate as I really liked the item before this happened.
customer_reviews.author: Croos

customer_reviews.title: Stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.text: I have to change my review. After 10 months, my case split. I contacted Amazon CS, which helped me send a message to Dreem. Dreem approved a replacement within just a few hours. A new case has be shipped. Thank you Dreem.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Although this is a superior iPhone case- is will not allow you to use ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a superior iPhone case- is will not allow you to use wireless charging so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr J A Anderson, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: This is simply the best phone case
customer_reviews.text: This is simply the best phone case. I also have a magnetic phone holder for the car so the two are perfectly complimentary. The case is smartly designed and looks fantastic. Would be nice to have more rustic leather look colors.
customer_reviews.author: R Crane

customer_reviews.title: Quality just seems mediocre. I guess for the price ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality just seems mediocre. I guess for the price it is what you would expect, the case itself does not seem to protect all that well though.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Corner cracking happened to the case in 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 6 months ago. Seldom did I take iPhone out of the case. However, corner cracking still happened in February at two of the corners although the Case is made of TPU.
customer_reviews.author: Wen Qu

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It's easy to remove the iPhone in it's safety case from the wallet. So convenient. Fits in my back pocket. Good looking, too.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce D.

customer_reviews.title: Almost the perfect case
customer_reviews.text: Well made, strong magnets for both the phone and the clasp. Unfortunately the metal in the phone case prevents wireless charging on the x. Still a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Hilton

customer_reviews.title: A Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. This would be over $100.00 in the Apple store and as good a quality in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Average Guy

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Dreem iPhone X case and find it to be solutely beautiful and functional! I wish I had purchased TWO. I can keep it in the case when at work/traveling etc.... while at home I easily remove the phone from the case. I’ve purchased many phone cases over the years given my long history with the iPhone. The Dreem case is by far the best case I’ve seen and now have. I love it and so will you!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan avani

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product . Great quality. Really happy I bought this product 5 stars all day long . Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Albertstiefel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome case.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case...love the versatility of being able to carry the wallet or disconnect for a slimmer profile. The magnets are super powerful...on more than one occasion I have had a pen attach when coming in close contact.
customer_reviews.author: SBus

customer_reviews.title: Plastic phone case broke
customer_reviews.text: Loved this wallet case until the plastic phone case broke. Didn’t drop it, the corner of the plastic case just broke. Can’t reach the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Compliments all the time on my case
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, the magnetic closure latches back instantly. It holds 3 credit cards easily.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Finally the right case!
customer_reviews.text: This case is great! I love that it’s a case within a case. I have a handful of cards in there and still closes fine. It’s great for on the go and you don’t want to carry a purse. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kellette A. O'connor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and design- very good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great case for the money. Very nice quality and I get a ton of compliments. J love that the phone can easily detach from the wallet if you need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection
customer_reviews.text: Well made case and the magnet fasteners work really well. Only complaint is that I can't use a wireless charger, seems like the detachable phone casing is too thick to pick up the charge.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s met my expectations and will make added comments later
customer_reviews.author: Darell J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Well designed, feels well made. I love that it is free of animal flesh.
customer_reviews.author: PeaceOnEarth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great material, so far my son loves it. He got it for his Birthday on the 3rd of feb, and he really likes the quality of the leather.
customer_reviews.author: Suhail Gabr

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful case, love the color and how strong the ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful case, love the color and how strong the magnets are, but when I received it and tried to hold my phone up it wouldn't do it. I started looking at it and I noticed that there was a crease already in it, so no matter how I tried to set my phone up to where it would hold it up it doesn't. But to me that is a little thing and I can put up with it.
customer_reviews.author: jamie milam

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Dreem wallet case.... it's a great product. Whenever I get a new phone I will buy another I did buy another as my puppy made the last one a chew stick! I love the product as I have now purchased four. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: James Fred Bauman

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly what I expected but I think I will enjoy it all the same
customer_reviews.text: Lovely wallet. Not exactly what I expected but I think I will enjoy it all the same.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda S. Curby

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very good wattet design. I like the ability to remove the phone from case
customer_reviews.author: DAB

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: gpt new phone, so this case was no longer needed
customer_reviews.author: michael donigan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have owned several and this is by far the best quality!
customer_reviews.author: mbradley17

customer_reviews.title: Nice case but does not work with wireless charging so ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice case but does not work with wireless charging so it makes it pretty much useless for the 8 or 10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but Charger Issue
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the case - beautiful! The only issue is it does not charge on the new flat charger in the case🤨
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY what I needed/wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I can't find anything negative about it (so far after a week).
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Burditt

customer_reviews.title: Try another case
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the quality is horizontal. Already started to loose my credit cards.
customer_reviews.author: PiumiM

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It was everything and more what was advertised. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela L. Doerr

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: Leather wallet is gorgeous. Quality not so good. Didn’t last but a few months before tear in leather. Doesn’t keep phone propped up and keeps falling due to worn leather.
customer_reviews.author: NAJARA

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality leather and everything else is top-notch
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than I expected. Very good quality leather and everything else is top-notch.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy B

customer_reviews.title: Great way to lose your cards.
customer_reviews.text: After only two months, the leather has become so loose that my ID and credit cards keep falling out. Also, does not support wireless charging.
customer_reviews.author: F. Weston

customer_reviews.title: The product itself is great! I wanted to get one for my new ...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great! I wanted to get one for my new iPhone X but they sent the wrong size. I ordered another, they sent the wrong size again, and the wrong color too this time. The packaging said iPhone X but they must have gotten their labels mixed up. From what I was reading the new case doesn't support wireless charging anyway so I went ahead and bought a more expensive case from another brand that doesn't look as good and won't stay closed. So I'm bummed, I wanted this case, had to got through two returns, and in the end I'm worse off. kind of pissed at these guys. Should be called Nightmare not Dreem.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Naubert

customer_reviews.title: Though nice I would’ve prefer the one pictured that’s why I ...
customer_reviews.text: The case pictured is not the case I received! Though nice I would’ve prefer the one pictured that’s why I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: Blessed1

customer_reviews.title: My wife bought this case and loves it. Much ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought this case and loves it. Much more functionality than the Apple Folio case and at a third of the cost. Plus she loves it that the company has a social mission where they donate half their profits to humanitarian projects
customer_reviews.author: Tushar Tambay

customer_reviews.title: Quality and magnet strength.
customer_reviews.text: High quality! Excellent case. Fits six cards and bills with no issues. Magnets are super strong. Buying one for each of my family members. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Heath

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: Great beautiful product except we are not able to charge using our wireless Samsung charger
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Charging device
customer_reviews.text: Cannot charge battery on a flat device without taking out of case. If I keep taking out of case to charge, I worry about the durability/integrity of it.
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase this far.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, looks great. Product is as described. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have really liked this product in the past, but after 6 months the back is falling off the phone case. This makes it virtually useless!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality, credit card holder feels like paper. Very cheap, had to return!
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and I love the easy to remove magnetic section.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Espana

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised as it is not to the standard I was expecting. Looks cheap and not that solid.
customer_reviews.author: Shaher Shammari

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Had one for my 6 and ordered this one for my 10. Love it
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful leather color that feels nice and durable; magnet is strong; and the phone stand is great.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this was absolutely the finest product I have ever seen. ty, Sharon
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallet very protective of my iPhone X
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet very protective of my iPhone X. I went on line to your web site signed in but ever saw anything regarding warranty. Have a great day! Thanks for your attractive wallet
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Estrada

product_meta.title: Dreem Fibonacci 2-in-1 Wallet-Case for iPhone X & Xs, Magnetic Detachable PC Slim-Case, Luxury Vegan Leather, RFID Protection, Smart 2-Way Stand, Gift-Box - Caramel
product_meta.description:
The Fibonacci by Dreem places perfect harmony of form and function into the palm of your hand. 

Make the most of your iPhone X with the world's most versatile iPhone wallet case and a classy style guaranteed to turn heads! 


Dreem Fibonacci iPhone X Designer Wallet + Case features: 

Protect your money and your identity: Rest assured with the best RFID blocking material lining all three pockets for total security 

Safe & Secure Magnetic 4-in-1 HYBRID: The Fibonacci morphs from a full wallet to a slim case, to a Facetime/Skype Stand, to a kickstand - what you want when you want it 

Multi-Angle Facetime Stand: A Vertical Kickstand that really works, easily adjustable for just the right angle 

Adjustable Kickstand: Read a book or watch a video with ease 

Hands-Free SafeMag Clasp: Skip the fuss, just open and close your wallet, it latches automatically. No dangly flap blocking your screen, and no magnets on top of your cards! 

Premium Quality Materials & Craftsmanship: Looks beautiful, feels great, wears well 
(our Premium Vegan Leather is made from polyurethane instead of cowhide) 


Buy your Fibonacci by Dreem today with the peace of mind that your satisfaction is 100% guaranteed: 
30-day Money Back Guarantee 
1-YEAR Warranty
